Welcome to St. Aloysius Institute of Technology Approved by AICTE, New Delhi and Affiliated to RGPV Bhopal. For more visit about page or ðŸ‘‡.

St. Aloysius Institute of Technology (SAIT), established by the Catholic Diocese of Jabalpur, aims to provide quality education in science and technology. With a focus on holistic development, SAIT empowers students to contribute to the nation through innovation, technology, and entrepreneurship, reflecting Indias emergence as a global competitor in the field.

The Mechanical Department designs and manufactures mechanical systems, emphasizing innovation and sustainability. It collaborates across industries and disciplines to advance technology while ensuring machinerys reliability

Computer Science Engineering merges computer science and engineering to create, manage, and enhance software, hardware, and computing systems, underpinning diverse applications and technological advancements across industries.

Civil Engineering encompasses planning, designing, constructing, and maintaining infrastructure like buildings, bridges, and transportation systems. It plays a crucial role in shaping urban environments and ensuring their sustainability and safety.

Electrical and Electronics Engineering innovates electrical systems and electronic devices, facilitating advancements in communication, renewable energy, automation, and diverse industries while ensuring reliable and efficient electrical infrastructure.

Welcome to St. Aloysius Institute of Technology, which is a sister concern of St. Aloysius College, known for its academic excellence and character formation, upholds a tradition of over five decades in providing quality education. With a legacy of producing successful graduates, SAIT remains dedicated to nurturing future technocrats and leaders.
